profile.title: Founder, Designer, Developer
profile.description: A self-taught creative with expertise in digital media and communication, my passion lies in web development and graphic design, while photography has been a long-standing interest that has inspired me for years.

intro.description: I'm a design engineer based in Germany with a passion for creating modern and functional digital experiences.

footer.quote: "We've always defined ourselves by the ability to overcome the impossible."

prose: Self-taught creative with expertise in digital media and communication, my passion lies in web development and graphic design, while photography has been a long-standing interest that has inspired me for years. From early self-initiated projects and a 3-year print and digital apprenticeship to eight years running my own studio delivering global projects. I balance design and engineering and have operated as a broad generalist under tight deadlines with multiple stakeholders, handling communication across internal teams, freelancers, clients and executives. I have hired employees and contractors and set up internal and external processes across the board.

Self-taught creative with expertise in digital media and communication, my passion lies in web development and graphic design, while photography has been a long-standing interest that has inspired me for years. My journey began with self-initiated projects and quickly expanded into a formal 3-year print and digital apprenticeship, allowing me to develop a strong foundation in both design and technology. Over eight years, I grew my own studio, delivering global projects across different industries and managing diverse teams..

I am adept at balancing creativity and engineering—handling responsibilities as a broad generalist under tight deadlines and with multiple stakeholders. I've managed communication with internal teams, freelancers, clients, and executives, and I have successfully hired employees and contractors and instituted internal and external processes that streamline studio operations.

As a self-taught creative with comprehensive expertise in digital media and communication, my passion lies in web development and graphic design, while photography represents a long-standing interest that has continuously inspired me and shaped my creative perspective. My journey began with early self-initiated projects and progressed through an 3-year apprenticeship in print and digital media, culminating in eight years where I successfully ran my own studio and delivered complex global projects for international clients. During this period, I collaborated with a wide range of businesses and stakeholders across different sectors, adapting to varied project requirements and building scalable digital solutions.

In my role, I precisely balance design and engineering and have established myself as a broad generalist who operates under extremely tight deadlines with multiple stakeholders. I effectively coordinate communication between internal teams, external freelancers, direct clients, and C-level executives, ensuring alignment and successful project delivery. Furthermore, I have extensive experience building teams by hiring and managing both full-time employees and contractors, and have established comprehensive internal and external processes and workflows that ensure efficiency and quality throughout all phases of production and deployment.
list: Self-taught creative with expertise in digital media and communication.
Passionate about web development, graphic design, and long-standing interest in photography.
Professional experience at unlimited.studio, b3plus GmbH & Co. KG.
Self-taught creative with broad expertise in digital media and communication.
Skilled in web development and graphic design; photography enthusiast.
Led early self-initiated projects and completed a 3-year print and digital apprenticeship at b3plus GmbH & Co. KG.
Co-founded and lead unlimited.studio GmbH, delivering global web and product solutions.
Self-taught creative with in-depth experience in digital media and communication; passion for web development, graphic design, and photography.
Began with self-initiated projects; completed 3-year media apprenticeship at b3plus GmbH & Co. KG.
Successfully ran unlimited.studio GmbH as Co-Founder/Managing Director for eight years, delivering global projects.
Expertly balances design and engineering, operates as a broad generalist under tight deadlines with multiple stakeholders.
Extensive experience in recruiting and managing team members, setting up efficient internal and external processes.

timeline.title: unlimited.studio GmbH
list: Lead end-to-end web and product projects: strategy, UX/UI, full-stack development, deployment, and operations.
Manage cross-functional roadmaps and teams; own budgeting, resourcing, and studio operations for on-time, in-scope delivery to global clients.
Drive product strategy and research, including discovery, user research, and requirements, translating outcomes into design systems, prototypes, and scalable web apps/sites.
Build and ship solutions: architecture, production code, server/cloud setup, CI/CD, monitoring, and post-launch iteration.
Run client relations and communication, aligning stakeholders from proposal to delivery; facilitate workshops, maintain documentation, and nurture long-term partnerships.

Own growth: performance marketing (Google Ads, Tag Manager, GA4, Search Console, Pinterest Ads, Meta Ads), tracking and attribution, funnels, reporting; social and lifecycle marketing (channels, content, community, newsletters/CRM, A/B tests, KPIs).

timeline.title: b3plus GmbH & Co. KG
timeline.content: Digital and Print Media Designer (Subject Area: Design and Technology)
list: 3 Year Apprenticeship
This qualification relates to level 4 of the German and the European Qualifications Framework.

items.title: Code as a design tool.
items.content: I treat development as part of the design loop, iterating on ideas in code to achieve speed, precision, and higher interaction quality.

items.title: End-to-end execution.
items.content: Running a studio for eight years taught me to handle everything from strategy and design to full-stack development and operations.

items.title: Craft and detail.
items.content: I build interfaces that feel alive—using scroll-driven narratives and subtle motion to create web experiences where quality matters.

items.title: Holistic perspective.
items.content: I approach projects with a broad view, ensuring that brand identity, product design, and technical implementation evolve in unison.

items.title: Design Engineer.
items.content: I bridge the gap between disciplines, designing with code constraints in mind and developing with a designer’s eye for typography.

items.title: Adaptable stack.
items.content: Experienced in Vue and Laravel but framework-agnostic. I learn fast and pick the right tool for the job to solve the problem at hand.
